item.title: Fast Forward Labs Data Leadership Conference
item.description: We’re excited to announce the first Fast Forward Labs Data Leadership Conference! Join us April 28 in New York City as we discuss how to build strong data teams in complex organizations. You can register here. In a recent Computerworld article, our CEO & Founder Hilary Mason explained common pitfalls organizations face when trying to build a data-driven organization: they over-invest in technical architecture, hire the wrong people, or lack the leadership focus required to cut across political silos, and foster innovation and change.
